name: Refuge
description: A sanctuary archetype where containment, healing, and protection dominate. Often emerges in cities with Saturn-Moon overlays and Shaiva lineage.

name: Crucible
description: A forge archetype where transformation occurs through conflict, pressure, or innovation. Linked to Mars-Ketu overlays and Agni lineage.

name: Signal
description: A beacon archetype that radiates clarity, direction, and civic identity. Associated with Sun-Mercury overlays and Solar lineage.

name: Labyrinth
description: An initiation archetype that invites ambiguity, depth, and transformation through mystery. Linked to Rahu-Moon overlays and Tantric lineage.

name: Archive
description: A custodian archetype that preserves memory, lineage, and semantic continuity. Often emerges in cities with Jupiter-Mercury overlays and Vedic lineage.
